description technical detail:
Acer G206HQLCb 19.5" LED VGA Black Monitor
Everyday series monitors give you the beauty you appreciate and the value you need. They showcase captivating widescreen visuals as well as eco-conscious features, making them perfect for enjoying marvelous multimedia at home or in your office, studio or study. You will enjoy tasks and entertainment more with fine details and smooth movement, thanks to high resolution, fast response time and superior contrast ratio. Games are more exciting and films truly cinematic when visuals are vibrant. Plus, the widescreen aspect ratio frames movies and HDTV content perfectly.
